About Us

Your Trusted
Local Partner

Proudly serving Murfreesboro and the surrounding communities with exceptional wines, premium spirits, craft beers, and fine cigars.

Our Story

A Passion for Quality

Liquor & Wine Outlet was founded with a simple mission: to bring the finest selection of wines, spirits, beers, and cigars to the Murfreesboro community. As a locally-owned business, we understand the importance of personal service and genuine expertise.

What started as a dream to create a different kind of liquor store—one that combines an exceptional selection with knowledgeable, friendly service—has grown into Murfreesboro's premier destination for discerning customers.

Whether you're a seasoned connoisseur or just beginning to explore the world of fine beverages, our team is here to guide you. We believe everyone deserves access to quality products and expert recommendations without pretension.

What We Stand For

Our Values

Exceptional Quality

We carefully curate our selection to bring you only the finest wines, spirits, beers, and cigars from around the world.

Expert Guidance

Our knowledgeable staff is passionate about helping you find the perfect bottle for any occasion or budget.

Rare Discoveries

We specialize in sourcing hard-to-find and limited-edition bottles that you won't find anywhere else.

Community First

As a locally-owned business, we're committed to serving Murfreesboro and building lasting relationships.
